title: Topic 004 Question 037
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system that is linked to an Active Directory domain named fabrikam.com by using Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS).
You have the resources shown in the following table.
You need to ensure that the integrated system can resolve DNS queries for fabrikam.com.
How should you complete the PowerShell script? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
